00030 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_PIPE_H_
00031 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_PIPE_H_
00032 #include <unistd.h> // pipe
00033 #include <fcntl.h>
00034 
00035 #include "lubyk/non_copyable.h"
00036 
00037 namespace lubyk {
00038 
00047 template<class T>
00048 class Fifo : private NonCopyable
00049 {
00052   volatile int read_idx_;
00053 
00056   volatile int write_idx_;
00057 
00060   static const int BUFFER_SIZE = 1024;
00061 
00064   T* volatile data_[BUFFER_SIZE];
00065 
00068   int pipe_fd_[2];
00069 public:
00070   Fifo()
00071       : read_idx_(0)
00072       , write_idx_(0) {
00073     // setup the pipe
00074     if (pipe(pipe_fd_) == -1) {
00075       throw Exception("Could not setup pipe during Fifo creation (%s).", strerror(errno));
00076     }
00077     
00078     // Set pipe fd as beeing NON-BLOCKING
00079     fcntl(pipe_fd_[0], F_SETFL, fcntl(pipe_fd_[0], F_GETFL) | O_NONBLOCK);
00080     fcntl(pipe_fd_[1], F_SETFL, fcntl(pipe_fd_[1], F_GETFL) | O_NONBLOCK);
00081   }
00082 
00083   virtual ~Fifo() {
00084     char read_buffer[20];
00085     // empty buffer
00086     while (read_idx_ != write_idx_) {
00087       int next = (read_idx_ + 1) % BUFFER_SIZE;
00088       T *data = data_[read_idx_];
00089       delete data;
00090       read_idx_ = next;
00091       // get a char from pipe
00092       read(pipe_fd_[0], read_buffer, 1);
00093     }
00094   }
00095 
00099   int fd() const {
00100     return pipe_fd_[0];
00101   }
00102 
00109   LuaStackSize pop(lua_State *L) {
00110     static char read_buffer[20];
00111     if (read_idx_ == write_idx_) {
00112       // empty queue
00113       return 0;
00114     } else {
00115       int next = (read_idx_ + 1) % BUFFER_SIZE;
00116       T *data = data_[read_idx_];
00117       read_idx_ = next;
00118       // get a char from pipe
00119       read(pipe_fd_[0], read_buffer, 1);
00120       int ret = unpack(L, data);
00121       delete data;
00122       return ret;
00123     }
00124   }
00125 
00126 protected:
00127 
00130   virtual LuaStackSize unpack(lua_State *L, T *data) = 0;
00131 
00135   bool push(T *data) {
00136     int next = (write_idx_ + 1) % BUFFER_SIZE;
00137     if (next != read_idx_) {
00138       data_[write_idx_] = data;
00139       write_idx_ = next;
00140       // Dummy message
00141       write(pipe_fd_[1], "", 1);
00142       return true;
00143     } else {
00144       // buffer full
00145       return false;
00146     }
00147   }
00148   
00149 };
00150 
00151 
00152 } // lubyk
00153 
00154 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_RECURSIVE_MUTEX_H_
